Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbals,

After the changes in the .22 patch, and watching hundreds of videos on youtube of fun things in this game I finally decided to stop being cheap and pick this game up, it's been great so far! Figured I should sign up here to keep up to date on things, and look around the forums for new ideas for ships to build or ways to challenge myself. I'm not a huge poster, so I likely won't be up to 500+ posts any time soon, but I do hope to be somewhat social in my stay here.

Welcome... to my LAIR!...

..

.

Sorry. :3 I had to do that... anyways! Have fun!

We do not guarantee your stay here will be 100% safe. We do not take responsibility of biting Kerbals, stray SRB's, and leaking fuel tanks. We also do not take responsibility of the Kraken, that is beyond our control. If you happen to encounter so said occurrences, please inform a moderater as they attempt to control this occurrence. This will not always end... "nicely". Also, if you do happen to be bit by a Kerbal, welp, say your goodbyes.
Have fun spinning out of control and staring at the Wikipedia page on orbital mechanics for 18 days, straight WITH OUT BLINKING
